import React from 'react'; import {Col, Row} from "react-bootstrap"; const notifications ={ backgroundColor: "whitesmoke", borderRadius: "50px", display: "block", width: "1300px", height: "160px", textAlign: "left", marginLeft: "150px", marginTop: "30px", alignContent: "left" } export const Notifications = (props) => ( <>
Notifications
Inventory Warning: There is not enough of Item #06846 to complete project sales on items.

Current inventory of Item #06879 will last until next week.

Sales for Item #08096 are projected to sell at a higher rate than expected!
)
